title: Get contents from an IDML object — idml_contents
text: idml idml class object created read_idml(). dir, file Directory file name IDML contents return. file NULL, format "list", "xml_document", "data.frame". "list", contents converted xml2::as_list() using supplied ns parameter. ns Optionally, named vector giving prefix-url pairs, produced xml_ns(). provided, names explicitly qualified ns prefix, .e. element bar defined namespace foo, called foo:bar. (similarly attributes). Default namespaces must given explicit name. ns ignored using xml_name<-() xml_set_name(). parent_nm Name top-level parent node. parent_nm character vector, extract_doc_df() returns data frame list. unique_nm TRUE, ensure parent_node names unique using extract data xml_document. Ignored node_names supplied. type Type data extract chlildren nodes: "attr" (attributes) "text". ... Needed compatibility generic. Unused. error_call execution environment currently running function, e.g. caller_env(). function mentioned error messages source error. See call argument abort() information.

title: Create a data frame from an XML document — xml_doc_to_df
text: doc XML document. parent_nm Name top-level parent node. parent_nm character vector, extract_doc_df() returns data frame list. parent_node XML document, node, node set. node_names Node names iterate . Default NULL. Typically created children parent node. unique_nm TRUE, ensure parent_node names unique using extract data xml_document. Ignored node_names supplied. nested TRUE, use parent_nm extract parent node doc. FALSE, parent_node defaults doc (unless parent_node supplied). type Type data extract chlildren nodes: "attr" (attributes) "text". ... Arguments passed readr::type_convert df data frame. col_types One NULL, cols() specification, string. See vignette("readr") details. NULL, column types imputed using rows. na Character vector strings interpret missing values. Set option character() indicate missing values. trim_ws leading trailing whitespace (ASCII spaces tabs) trimmed field parsing ? locale locale controls defaults vary place place. default locale US-centric (like R), can use locale() create locale controls things like default time zone, encoding, decimal mark, big mark, day/month names. guess_integer TRUE, guess integer types whole numbers, FALSE guess numeric type numbers.
